CABINET_ASSEMBLY_DETAIL_ID, FAUDIT_MAN, FAUDIT_TIME, FAUDIT_STATE, FAUDIT_FNOTE, FCREATOR, FCTIME, CABINET_AUDIT_ID, FTYPE
mapper.update:
update
set CABINET_ASSEMBLY_DETAIL_ID = #{CABINET_ASSEMBLY_DETAIL_ID}, FAUDIT_MAN = #{FAUDIT_MAN}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{FAUDIT_TIME}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{FAUDIT_STATE}, FAUDIT_FNOTE = #{FAUDIT_FNOTE}, FCREATOR = #{FCREATOR}, FCTIME = #{FCTIME}, FTYPE=#{FTYPE}, CABINET_AUDIT_ID = CABINET_AUDIT_ID where CABINET_AUDIT_ID = #{CABINET_AUDIT_ID}
mapper.select:
select f.CABINET_ASSEMBLY_DETAIL_ID, f.FAUDIT_MAN, f.FAUDIT_TIME, f.FAUDIT_STATE FAUDIT_STATE1, f.FAUDIT_FNOTE, f.FCREATOR, f.FCTIME, f.CABINET_AUDIT_ID, f.FTYPE, staff.Name as Responsible_Technology_Name, pro.* from f inner join DT_PROJECT pro on pro.PROJECT_ID = f.CABINET_ASSEMBLY_DETAIL_ID
left join oa_staff staff on staff.STAFF_ID = pro.Responsible_Technology where 1=1 and pro.FAudit_State='待审核' and f.FAUDIT_STATE='待审核' [fhstart] order by PCREATE_TIME desc [fhend]
